title: Mystery on Lockhart Road
description: In this Dateline classic, former Indiana State Police trooper David Camm arrives home and finds his wife and children murdered in their garage. Dennis Murphy reports. Originally aired on NBC on January 31, 2014.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
